title: The Atheist Experience: all shows of 2012 (795-846) (ogg)
description:
The Atheist Experience is a call-in show on Austin's public access TV. It airs on Sundays 22:30-23:30 UTC or 21:30-22:30 UTC during DST and is sponsored by the Atheist Community of Austin. Live stream at that time:   <a href="
http://www.ustream.tv/channel/the-atheist-experience" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.ustream.tv/channel/the-atheist-experience</a> 

Find more information and other recordings on TAE's website:   <a href="
http://www.atheist-experience.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.atheist-experience.com/</a> 
 

Here are the topics with better layout:   <a href="
http://www.atheist-experience.com/archive/?y=2013#table" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.atheist-experience.com/archive/?y=2013#table</a>

Please, do not shut yours off to hit and run after the download is done, but keep seeding. Thank you. :-)


== Show topics ==

Argument from ""Making Sense"" Tracie identifies a type of argument that we hear that a claim ""just makes sense,"" and therefore must be true.  
Viewer Calls. Russell and Jeff take callers.    
Viewer Calls. Matt and Martin take viewer calls.    
Nothing New Under the Son. Don shows how none of the supernatural claims about Jesus were novel.    
Socialization vs. Indoctrination. Tracie describes the difference between socialization and indoctrination.    
The Bible as Fan Fiction. Jenn looks at the Bible as just fan fiction.    
Responding to a Viewer E-mail. Matt responds to a viewer e-mail.    
Viewer Calls. Matt and Jeff take callers.    
God's Absolute Morality. Don examines the failure of God's absolute morality.    
Viewer Calls. Russell and Tracie discuss some news items and take viewer calls.    
Marriage Equality. Jenn and Matt discuss the DOMA/Prop 8 challenge before the Supreme Court.    
Viewer Calls. John and Matt take callers. This is John's first time in front of the camera. He's been a crew member for years.    
Matt Goes to Church. Matt describes his latest visit to a local Austin church.    
Christian Message Subtext. Don describes what he hears in the subtext of the Christian message.    
Atheist Parenting. Jenn and Russell talk with Dale McGowan about atheist parenting.    
Imagined Childhood Powers. Tracie describes her imagined childhood powers and invited others to contribute theirs.    
Viewer Calls. In a rare pairing, Jeff and Martin take calls.    
Peer Review. Russell talks about the peer review process and how it helps to benefit scientific knowledge.    
What's Possible? Tracie shows how, even with some uncertainty, some things are known to be impossible.    
The Failure of TRUTH. Don talks about how various religions/sects claims of TRUTH are obvious falsehoods.    
Westpoint Religious Graduation. Jen describes the experience of an atheist officer at his Westpoint graduation.    
Objective Morality. Russell and Martin talk with atheist Dan Fincke about objective morality.    
Viewer Calls. Matt and Jeff take callers.    
The Failure of Faith. Don discusses how faith is a path to harm and why chuch-state separation is so important.    
Treatment of Gays in Iraq. Russell gives some atheist news and Tracie reads a letter concerning treatment of gays in Iraq.    
Polls about Non-Belief. Jenn describes a new poll about what people think about the rise of non-belief in the US.    
Viewer Calls. Matt and Martin take viewer calls.    
The Failure of Scripture. Don talks about founder Thomas Paine and how he nailed most of the problems with the Bible.    
Viewer Calls. Matt and Jeff take callers.    
Interview with Rob Poole. Tracie interviews Rob Poole, Professor of Social Psychiatry, Bangor University, North Wales.    
Ad Hominem Attacks. Jenn clarifies what an ad hominem attack is and isn't.    
Viewer Calls. Russell and Martin take viewer calls.    
Christian Extended Universe. Lynnea talks about how Christianity (as fiction) has extended the basic story in various directions.    
God's Mistakes. Don talks about the mistakes the god of the Bible makes.    
Indoctrination. Tracie talks about how children get indoctrinated into Christianity and other religions and its harmful effects.    
Religion and Depression. Dave Silverman pimps the American Atheist Conv. Jen examines a study correlating religious belief and depression.    
Viewer Calls. Russell and Lynnea take callers.    
Matt Flies Solo. Matt flies solo and spends the episode taking viewer calls.    
Heaven. Don and Matt discuss the lack of consistency in beliefs about heaven.    
Rob Poole Recap. Tracie talks more about religious trauma syndrome.    
John's Path to Atheism. John talks about his path to atheism.    
Viewer Calls. Matt and Martin take viewer calls.    
Messianic Jews & Other Crazy News. Jen talks about Messianic Jews, exorcisms against same-sex marriage, and North Korean killings.    
Lies: Modern Propaganda. Don talks about how Christianity seemingly needs lies for successful marketing.    
Viewer Calls. Russell and Martin take viewer calls.    
Polar Express. Tracie talks about religious messages in the Christmas movie ""Polar Express"".   
War on Xmas. Matt and Jen talk about some news stories related to the ""war"" on Christmas.  
The Failure of Fraternity. Don responds to the Pope's ""day of peace"" message and its central theme of fraternity.
